SBI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 12 Vice President Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 11:33 IST
 State Bank of India
 12 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 500,000 to 833,333




FOLLOW

The State Bank of India (SBI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 12 Centre Head, Senior Vice President, and Deputy Vice President Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, MCA, and M.Sc. can apply for the SBI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

SBI Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Centre Head	01	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, MCA, M.Sc
Senior Vice President	03
Deputy Vice President	08

SBI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 35 Years.
The maximum age limit: 50 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

SBI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

SBI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For SC/ST/PWD candidates: NIL.
For General/ OBC candidates: Rs. 750/-.

SBI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 5,00,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 8,33,333/- per month.
How to Apply for the SBI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the SBI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
